verses.text: In the \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* it.

And the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* into his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, with \w part|strong="H7117"\w* of the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: which he \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w god|strong="H0430"\w*; and he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* into the \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of his \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Ashpenaz|strong="H0828"\w* the \w master|strong="H7227"\w* of his \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*, that he should \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add certain\add* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and of the \w king’s|strong="H4410"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and of the \w princes|strong="H6579"\w*;

\w Children|strong="H3206"\w* in whom \add was\add* no \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, but \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w favoured|strong="H4758"\w*, and \w skilful|strong="H7919"\w* in all \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, and \w cunning|strong="H3045"\w* in \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* \w science|strong="H4093"\w*, and such as \add had\add* \w ability|strong="H3581"\w* in them to \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w*, and whom they might \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* the \w learning|strong="H5612"\w* and the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* them a \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w provision|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w meat|strong="H6598"\w*, and of the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* which he \w drank|strong="H4960"\w*: so \w nourishing|strong="H1431"\w* them \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, that at the \w end|strong="H7117"\w* thereof they might \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft the wine…: Heb. the wine of his drink\f*

Now among these were of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*:

Unto whom the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w*: for he \w gave|strong="H7760"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \add the name\add* of \w Belteshazzar|strong="H1095"\w*; and to \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, of \w Shadrach|strong="H7714"\w*; and to \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, of \w Meshach|strong="H4335"\w*; and to \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*, of \w Abed-nego|strong="H5664"\w*.

¶ But \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* \w purposed|strong="H7760"\w* in his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* that he would not \w defile|strong="H1351"\w* himself with the \w portion|strong="H6598"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w meat|strong="H6598"\w*, nor with the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* which he \w drank|strong="H4960"\w*: therefore he \w requested|strong="H1245"\w* of the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* that he might not \w defile|strong="H1351"\w* himself.

Now \w God|strong="H0430"\w* had \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* into \w favour|strong="H2617"\w* and tender \w love|strong="H7356"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, I \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, who hath \w appointed|strong="H4487"\w* your \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* and your \w drink|strong="H4960"\w*: for why should he \w see|strong="H7200"\w* your \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* worse \w liking|strong="H2196"\w* than the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* which \add are\add* of your \w sort|strong="H1524"\w*? then shall ye make \add me\add* \w endanger|strong="H2325"\w* my \w head|strong="H7218"\w* to the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 1.10 \ft worse…: Heb. sadder\f*\f + \fr 1.10 \ft sort: or, term, or, continuance?\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* to \w Melzar|strong="H4453"\w*, whom the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* had \w set|strong="H4487"\w* over \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*,\f + \fr 1.11 \ft Melzar: or, the steward\f*

\w Prove|strong="H5254"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, I beseech thee, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and let them \w give|strong="H5414"\w* us \w pulse|strong="H2235"\w* to \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft pulse: Heb. of pulse\f*\f + \fr 1.12 \ft to eat…: Heb. that we may eat, etc\f*

Then let our \w countenances|strong="H4758"\w* be looked \w upon|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and the \w countenance|strong="H4758"\w* of the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* that \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the \w portion|strong="H6598"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w meat|strong="H6598"\w*: and as thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w*, \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.
So he \w consented|strong="H8085"\w* to them in this \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w proved|strong="H5254"\w* them \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

And at the \w end|strong="H7117"\w* of \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* their \w countenances|strong="H4758"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w fairer|strong="H2896"\w* and \w fatter|strong="H1277"\w* in \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* than all the \w children|strong="H3206"\w* which did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w portion|strong="H6598"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w meat|strong="H6598"\w*.

Thus \w Melzar|strong="H4453"\w* took \w away|strong="H5375"\w* the portion of their \w meat|strong="H6598"\w*, and the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* that they should \w drink|strong="H4960"\w*; and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w pulse|strong="H2235"\w*.

¶ As for these \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w children|strong="H3206"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w knowledge|strong="H4093"\w* and \w skill|strong="H7919"\w* in all \w learning|strong="H5612"\w* and \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: and \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* had \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w* in all \w visions|strong="H2377"\w* and \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*.\f + \fr 1.17 \ft Daniel…: or, he made Daniel understand\f*

Now at the \w end|strong="H7117"\w* of the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he should \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* them in, then the \w prince|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them in \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with them; and among them all was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* none like \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w*, \w Hananiah|strong="H2608"\w*, \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, and \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w*: therefore \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* they \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And in all \w matters|strong="H1697"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add and\add* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*, that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w enquired|strong="H1245"\w* of them, he \w found|strong="H4672"\w* them ten \w times|strong="H6235"\w* \w better|strong="H3027"\w* than all the \w magicians|strong="H2748"\w* \add and\add* \w astrologers|strong="H0825"\w* that \add were\add* in all his \w realm|strong="H4438"\w*.\f + \fr 1.20 \ft wisdom…: Heb. wisdom of understanding\f*
And \w Daniel|strong="H1840"\w* continued \add even\add* unto the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w*.
